overview: UFC 249: Ferguson vs. Gaethje was a mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that took place on May 9, 2020 at VyStar Veterans Memorial Arena in Jacksonville, Florida, United States.  UFC 249 PPV Main Event On ESPN+:  155 lbs.: Tony Ferguson vs. Justin Gaethje  135 lbs.: Henry Cejudo vs. Dominick Cruz  265 lbs.: Francis Ngannou vs. Jairzinho Rozenstruik  145 lbs.: Jeremy Stephens vs. Calvin Kattar  265 lbs.: Greg Hardy vs. Yorgan de Castro
title: UFC 249: Ferguson vs. Gaethje
